#summary MessagingToolkit SmartGateway

= Introduction =

MessagingToolkit SmartGateway is an application built on top of the [http://twit88.com/platform/projects/show/messagingtoolkit MessagingToolkit] library which can be used to send and receive SMS

The current beta version can be downloaded *[http://messagingtoolkit-smartgateway.googlecode.com/files/SmartGateway-beta.msi here]*.
